Package src

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddEventDialog
    AddEventDialog is used to contain all panels for adding Event
    AdminInterface
    AdminInterface class provide an interface for the Administrator to manage the User
    Database
    Database is used to connect to the database and perform CRUD.
    DateComboBoxRenderer
    DateComboBoxRenderer is used to render TimeComboBox to display ("HH::mm") format.
    DateLabelFormatter
    DateLabelFormatter is used to format day in JDateTimePicker.
    DateTime
    DateTime is used to contain all labels, text fields that relates to DateTime and TimeComboBox.
    Description
    Description is used to contain icon, label and text field of description of Event.
    EditEventDialog
    EditEventDialog is used to contains the title, time and button to delete and edit event of Event.
    EditEventDialog.DateComboBoxRenderer
    DateComboBoxRenderer is used to render TimeComboBox to display ("HH::mm") format.
    EditEventDialog.DateLabelFormatter
    DateLabelFormatter is used to format day in JDateTimePicker.
    EditEventDialog.DateTime
    DateTime is used to contain all labels, text fields that relates to DateTime and TimeComboBox for editing event.
    EditEventDialog.Description
    Description is used to contain icon, label and text field of description of Event for editing Event.
    EditEventDialog.FriendField
    FriendField is used to contains icon, text field, list of friends of the Event
    EditEventDialog.LocationField
    LocationField is used to contains icon, label and text field of location of Event for editing Event.
    EditEventDialog.Priority
    Priority is used to contains a JComboBox for user to select the priority for editing Event.
    EditEventDialog.Reminder
    Reminder is used to contains a JComboBox for user to select remind options for editing Event.
    EditEventDialog.TimeComboBox
    TimeComboBox is used to contains the JComboBox to select the time of the Event for editing Event.
    EditEventDialog.TitlePanel
    TitlePanel is used to contain the label and the text field of title for editing Event.
    EditProfile
    EditProfile class provide an interface for the Administrator to edit the profile of an user
    Event
    This class is used to create a Event object.
    EventMainPanel
    EventMainPanel is used to contain DateTime panel, FiendField panel, LocationField panel, Description panel, Reminder panel and Priority panel.
    FileChoose
    Make a JFileChooser to choose a location to save export PDF.
    FriendField
    FriendField is used to contains icon, text field, list of friends of the Event
    Hash
    Hash class to hash SHA-256.
    LoadEvents
    This class is used to get Event from the Database and change the events to corresponding datatype.
    LocationField
    LocationField is used to contains icon, label and text field of location of Event.
    LoginScreen
    LoginScreen is used for user login.
    Mail
    Mail class is used to send emails to user and participants.
    MailJob
    This class is used to create a remind email jobs.
    MainFrame
    Main frame of user interface.
    MonthCell
    A MonthCell has all the information to display a month cell.
    MonthCellComponent
    MonthTableCellComponent extends JPanel to show all events inside a month cell.
    MonthCellEditor
    MonthTableCellEditor extends AbstractCellEditor implements TableCellEditor to edit all events inside a month cell.
    MonthCellRenderer
    MonthCellRender implements TableCellRenderer to show all events inside a month cell.
    MonthTableModel
    MonthTableModel extends DefaultTableModel to be the table model for the month view.
    Navigation
    Navigation class extends JPanel is used to navigate between different screens
    PDF
    PDF class to export the monthly and weekly events information to PDF.
    Priority
    Priority is used to contains a JComboBox for user to select the priority.
    Profile
    Profile is used to display the user properties like username, email and phone number.
    Register
    Register JFrame for registering new user with username and password
    RegisterInfo
    Second register JFrame to input name, email, phone number
    RegisterValidator
    This class is used to validate the input of the user using regular expressions.
    Reminder
    Reminder is used to contains a JComboBox for user to select remind options.
    SchedulerJava
    This class is used to schedule the sending remind email jobs.
    SetBtn
    SetBtn is used to contain the set button when creating Event.
    Settings
    The settings panel of the user.
    SwingCalendar
    SwingCalendar extends JPanel, and is used to display the calendar, which can be shown in a JFrame.
    TimeComboBox
    TimeComboBox is used to contains the JComboBox to select the time of the Event.
    TISCH
    Main class for the Time Scheduler.
    TitlePanel
    TitlePanel is used to contain label and text field of title for the Event
    User
    This class is used to create a User object.
    ViewProfile
    ViewProfile class display the user's profile
    WeekCell
    A WeekCell has all the information to display a week cell.
    WeekCellComponent
    A JPanel that show all the information for a week cell.
    WeekCellEditor
    WeekCellEditor implements TableCellEditor to edit all events inside a week cell.
    WeekCellRenderer
    WeekCellRenderer implements TableCellRenderer to show all events inside a week cell.
    WeekTableModel
    WeekTableModel extends DefaultTableModel to be the table model for the week view.
